/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/clisettings

Description

Manage CLI credentials and access

put

Description

Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="cliSettings">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAccess"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordExpiry"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sshLoginBannerText"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<cliSettings>
  <userName></userName>
  <password></password>
  <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
  <passwordExpiry></passwordExpiry>
  <sshLoginBannerText></sshLoginBannerText>
</cliSettings>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/coredump

Description

Enabling core-dump feature results in deployment of inbuilt extra disk to save core-dump files. 1GB for compact edge and 8GB for other types. Disabling detaches the disk

post

Description

Modify core dump setting

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

Description

Configure DHCP for NSX Edge

get

Description

Get DHCP configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure DHCP service

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dhcp">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="staticBindings">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="staticBinding">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="macAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostname"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigDNS"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ipPools">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ipPool">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigDNS"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<dhcp>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <staticBindings>
    <staticBinding>
      <macAddress></macAddress>
      <vmId></vmId>
      <vnicId></vnicId>
      <hostname></hostname>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
      <domainName></domainName>
      <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
      <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
      <leaseTime></leaseTime>
      <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
    </staticBinding>
  </staticBindings>
  <ipPools>
    <ipPool>
      <ipRange></ipRange>
      <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      <domainName></domainName>
      <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
      <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
      <leaseTime></leaseTime>
      <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
    </ipPool>
  </ipPools>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
</dhcp>

delete

Description

Delete the DHCP configuration, restoring it to factory default

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/bindings

Description

Adding static-binding to DHCP configuration.

post

Description

Append a static-binding to DHCP config. A static-binding ID is returned within a Location HTTP header

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="staticBinding">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostname"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<staticBinding>
  <vmId></vmId>
  <vnicId></vnicId>
  <hostname></hostname>
  <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
  <domainName></domainName>
  <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
  <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
  <leaseTime></leaseTime>
  <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</staticBinding>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/bindings/{bindingID}

Description

Specific DHCP static binding

URI Parameters

bindingID string required

Specified static-binding ID

delete

Description

Delete the static-binding by ID

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/ippools

Description

Adding IP pools to DHCP configuration

post

Description

Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipPool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<ipPool>
  <ipRange></ipRange>
  <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
  <domainName></domainName>
  <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
  <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
  <leaseTime></leaseTime>
  <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</ipPool>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/relay

Description

Configure DHCP relay

get

Description

Query DHCP relay

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure DHCP relay

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="relay">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="relayServer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fqdn"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="relayAgents">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="relayAgent">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicIndex"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="giAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<relay>
  <relayServer>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
  </relayServer>
  <relayAgents>
    <relayAgent>
      <vnicIndex></vnicIndex>
      <giAddress></giAddress>
    </relayAgent>
  </relayAgents>
</relay>

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dns/config

Description

Configure DNS servers to which vShield Edge can relay name resolution requests

get

Description

Retrieve DNS configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure DNS servers

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dns">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="dnsServers">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cacheSize"/>
        <xs:element name="listeners">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<dns>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <dnsServers>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </dnsServers>
  <cacheSize></cacheSize>
  <listeners>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </listeners>
  <logging>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
    <enable></enable>
  </logging>
</dns>

delete

Description

Security

  • basic

DNS settings (primary/secondary and search domain) of an Edge

Description

Security

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dnsClient">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Description

Configure firewall for an Edge

get

Description

Read the firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure firewall for an Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>

delete

Description

Delete firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>

  • basic

put

Description

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="globalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<globalConfig> <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections> <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets> <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts> <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic> <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic> <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen> <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished> <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose> <udpTimeout></udpTimeout> <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout> <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout> <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout> </globalConfig>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

Description

Firewall rules

post

Description

Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

aboveRuleId string

rule Id

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Description

Specific firewall rule

URI Parameters

ruleId string required

Rule ID

get

Description

Retrieve specific rule

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Modify a specific firewall rule

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element name="source">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destination">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="application">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule>
  <ruleTag></ruleTag>
  <name></name>
  <source>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
  </source>
  <destination>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
  </destination>
  <application>
    <applicationId></applicationId>
  </application>
  <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
  <direction></direction>
  <action></action>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  <description></description>
</rule>

Description

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Description

Ensures that an Edge appliance is always available on your virtualized network.

get

Description

Get high availability configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure high availability

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="highAvailability">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
        <xs:element name="ipAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="declareDeadTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<highAvailability>
  <vnic></vnic>
  <ipAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </ipAddresses>
  <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
  <enabled></enabled>
</highAvailability>

delete

Description

Delete high availability configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Description

Working with all NSX Edge router interfaces

post

Description

Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

action string required

Always set to 'patch'

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="interfaces">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="interface">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element name="addressGroups">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isConnected"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<interfaces>
  <interface>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <connectedToId></connectedToId>
  </interface>
</interfaces>

get

Description

Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Delete interfaces

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

index string

Specify index of interface to delete (e.g. ?index=&index=). If no indices specified, all interfaces are deleted

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

Description

Manage a specific NSX Edge router interface

URI Parameters

index string required

Specified router interface

get

Description

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/ipsec/config

Description

Working with IPSEC VPN

get

Description

Retrieve IPSec configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure IPSEC VPN

Security

  • basic

Request Example (application/xml)

<ipsec>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <logLevel></logLevel>
  <enable></enable>
  <global>
    <psk></psk>
    <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    <caCertificates>
      <caCertificate></caCertificate>
    </caCertificates>
    <crlCertificates>
      <crlCertificate></crlCertificate>
    </crlCertificates>
  </global>
  <sites>
    <site>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <name></name>
      <description></description>
      <localId></localId>
      <localIp></localIp>
      <peerId></peerId>
      <peerIp></peerIp>
      <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
      <authenticationMode>psk</authenticationMode>
      <psk></psk>
      <enablePfs></enablePfs>
      <dhGroup></dhGroup>
      <localSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </localSubnets>
      <peerSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </peerSubnets>
    </site>
  </sites>
</ipsec>

IPSec statistics

Description

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Description

L2 VPN allows you to configure a tunnel between two sites. VM's remain on the same subnet in spite of being moved between these sites, enabling you to extend your datacenter. An NSX Edge at one site can provide all services to VM's on the other site.

post

Description

Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

enableService boolean required

Enable or disable L2 VPN

get

Description

Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure L2VPN for server or client

Security

  • basic

Request Example (application/xml)

<l2Vpn>
  <enabled>true</enabled>
  <logging>
    <enable>false</enable>
    <logLevel>info</logLevel>
    </logging>
    <l2VpnSites>
    <l2VpnSite>
      <server>
        <configuration>
          <listenerIp></listenerIp>
          <listenerPort></listenerPort>
          <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
          <serverCertificate></serverCertificate>
          <peerSites>
            <peerSite>
              <name></name>
              <description></description>
              <l2VpnUser>
                <userId></userId>
                <password></password>
              </l2VpnUser>
              <vnics>
                <index></index>
              </vnics>
              <egressOptimization>
                <gatewayIpAddress></gatewayIpAddress>
              </egressOptimization>
              <enabled></enabled>
            </peerSite>
          </peerSites>
        </configuration>
      </server>
    </l2VpnSite>
  </l2VpnSites>
</l2Vpn>

delete

Description

Delete L2 VPN

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics

Description

L2 VPN statistics

get

Description

Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

Security

  • basic

post

  • basic

Query Parameters

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Description

NSX Edge load balancer

get

Description

Get current load balancer config

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure load balancer

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="loadBalancer">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="virtualServer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="virtualServerId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionRateLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultPoolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="template"/>
              <xs:element name="persistence">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serverSslEnabled"/>
              <xs:element name="clientSsl"/>
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clientAuth"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serviceCertificate"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="pool">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="poolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element name="member">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="memberId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="monitor">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="script"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<loadBalancer>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <virtualServer>
    <virtualServerId></virtualServerId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <port></port>
    <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
    <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    <applicationRuleId></applicationRuleId>
  </virtualServer>
  <applicationProfile>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <name></name>
    <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
    <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
    <template></template>
    <persistence>
      <method></method>
      <cookieName></cookieName>
      <cookieMode></cookieMode>
    </persistence>
    <serverSslEnabled></serverSslEnabled>
    <clientSsl>
      <clientAuth></clientAuth>
      <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    </clientSsl>
  </applicationProfile>
  <pool>
    <poolId></poolId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <transparent></transparent>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <member>
      <memberId></memberId>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <weight></weight>
      <port></port>
      <monitorPort></monitorPort>
      <minConn></minConn>
      <maxConn></maxConn>
      <name></name>
    </member>
  </pool>
  <monitor>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <type></type>
    <interval></interval>
    <timeout></timeout>
    <maxRetries></maxRetries>
    <method></method>
    <url></url>
    <name></name>
  </monitor>
  <applicationRule>
    <name></name>
    <script></script>
  </applicationRule>
</loadBalancer>

delete

Description

Delete load balancer configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationprofiles

Description

Application profiles define the behavior of a particular type of network traffic

post

Description

Add an application profile

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
        <xs:element name="persistence">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

<applicationProfile>
  <name></name>
  <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
  <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
  <persistence>
    <method></method>
    <cookieName></cookieName>
    <cookieMode></cookieMode>
  </persistence>
</applicationProfile>

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="pool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
        <xs:element name="member">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

    <port></port>

    <monitorPort></monitorPort>
  </member>
</pool>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers

post

Description

Add a virtual server

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="virtualServer">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionLimit"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionRateLimit"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultPoolId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationRuleId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<virtualServer>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  <protocol></protocol>
  <port></port>
  <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
  <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
  <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
  <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
  <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
  <applicationRuleId></applicationRuleId>
</virtualServer>

get

Description

Retrieve all virtual servers

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Delete all

Security

  • basic

virtualserverID string required

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

Description

Working with management interfaces for an NSX Edge router

get

Description

Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="mgmtInterface">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="addressGroups">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<mgmtInterface>
  <addressGroups>
    <addressGroup>
      <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
    </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
  <mtu></mtu>
  <connectedToId></connectedToId>
</mgmtInterface>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

Description

SNAT and DNAT rules for NSX Edge

put

Description

Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="nat">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="natRule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<nat>
  <natRules>
    <natRule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <action></action>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <originalAddress></originalAddress>
      <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <description></description>
      <protocol></protocol>
      <translatedPort></translatedPort>
      <originalPort></originalPort>
    </natRule>
  </natRules>
</nat>

get

Description

Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

Description

NAT rules

post

Description

Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

aboveRuleId string

Specified rule ID. If the ID does not exist, Edge Manager displays an error

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="natRules">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<natRules>
  <natRule>
    <action></action>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
    <originalPort></originalPort>
  </natRule>
</natRules>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

Specified NAT rule

URI Parameters

Specified rule ID

put

Description

Modify a NAT rule

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="natRule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<natRule>
  <action></action>
  <vnic></vnic>
  <originalAddress></originalAddress>
  <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <description></description>
  <protocol></protocol>
  <translatedPort></translatedPort>
  <originalPort></originalPort>
</natRule>

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Description

Static and dynamic routing for each NSX Edge

get

Description

Retrieve routes

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routing">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
              <xs:element name="logging">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="staticRouting">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="route">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ospf">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultOriginate"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gracefulRestart"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocolAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forwardingAddress"/>
              <xs:element name="ospfAreas">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfArea">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element name="authentication">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ospfInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deadInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="isis">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
              <xs:element name="areaIds">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
              <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="bgp">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<routing>
  <routingGlobalConfig>
    <ecmp></ecmp>
    <routerId></routerId>
    <logging>
      <enable></enable>
      <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <ipPrefixes>
      <ipPrefix>
        <name></name>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </ipPrefix>
    </ipPrefixes>
  </routingGlobalConfig>
  <staticRouting>
    <staticRoutes>
      <route>
        <description></description>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <network></network>
        <nextHop></nextHop>
        <mtu></mtu>
      </route>
    </staticRoutes>
    <defaultRoute>
      <description></description>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
      <mtu></mtu>
    </defaultRoute>
  </staticRouting>
  <ospf>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <defaultOriginate></defaultOriginate>
    <gracefulRestart></gracefulRestart>
    <protocolAddress></protocolAddress>
    <forwardingAddress></forwardingAddress>
    <ospfAreas>
      <ospfArea>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <type></type>
        <authentication>
          <type></type>
          <value></value>
        </authentication>
      </ospfArea>
    </ospfAreas>
    <ospfInterfaces>
      <ospfInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <deadInterval></deadInterval>
        <priority></priority>
        <cost></cost>
      </ospfInterface>
    </ospfInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </ospf>
  <isis>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <systemId></systemId>
    <areaIds>
      <areaId></areaId>
    </areaIds>
    <isType></isType>
    <domainPassword></domainPassword>
    <areaPassword></areaPassword>
    <isisInterfaces>
      <isisInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <meshGroup></meshGroup>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
        <lspInterval></lspInterval>
        <metric></metric>
        <priority></priority>
        <circuitType></circuitType>
        <password></password>
      </isisInterface>
    </isisInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </isis>
  <bgp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <localAS></localAS>
    <bgpNeighbours>
      <bgpNeighbour>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <remoteAS></remoteAS>
        <weight></weight>
        <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
        <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
        <password></password>
        <bgpFilters>
          <bgpFilter>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <network></network>
            <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
            <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
          </bgpFilter>
        </bgpFilters>
      </bgpNeighbour>
    </bgpNeighbours>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </bgp>
</routing>

delete

Description

Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Description

Manage BGP routes for NSX Edge

get

Description

Query BGP

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure BGP

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="bgp">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
        <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                    <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<bgp>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <localAS></localAS>
  <bgpNeighbours>
    <bgpNeighbour>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <remoteAS></remoteAS>
      <weight></weight>
      <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
      <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
      <password></password>
      <bgpFilters>
        <bgpFilter>
          <direction></direction>
          <action></action>
          <network></network>
          <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
          <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
        </bgpFilter>
      </bgpFilters>
    </bgpNeighbour>
  </bgpNeighbours>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rules>
      <rule>
        <prefixName></prefixName>
        <from>
          <isis></isis>
          <ospf></ospf>
          <bgp></bgp>
          <static></static>
          <connected></connected>
        </from>
        <action></action>
      </rule>
    </rules>
  </redistribution>
</bgp>

delete

Description

Delete BGP Routing

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

Description

Global configuration

put

Description

Configure global route

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<routingGlobalConfig>
  <routerId></routerId>
  <ecmp></ecmp>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <ipPrefixes>
    <ipPrefix>
      <name></name>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </ipPrefix>
  </ipPrefixes>
</routingGlobalConfig>
