/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/isis

Description

IS-IS Routes for NSX Edge

get

Description

Query ISIS

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Config ISIS

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="isis">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
        <xs:element name="areaIds">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
        <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<isis>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <systemId></systemId>
  <areaIds>
    <areaId></areaId>
  </areaIds>
  <isType></isType>
  <domainPassword></domainPassword>
  <areaPassword></areaPassword>
  <isisInterfaces>
    <isisInterface>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <meshGroup></meshGroup>
      <helloInterval></helloInterval>
      <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
      <lspInterval></lspInterval>
      <metric></metric>
      <priority></priority>
      <circuitType></circuitType>
      <password></password>
    </isisInterface>
  </isisInterfaces>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
            <from>
              <isis></isis>
              <ospf></ospf>
              <bgp></bgp>
              <static></static>
              <connected></connected>
            </from>
            <action></action>
          </rule>
      </rules>
  </redistribution>
</isis>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/ospf

Description

OSPF Routing for NSX Edge

get

Description

Query OSPF config

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure OSPF

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ospf">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="ospfAreas">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ospfArea">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element name="authentication">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ospfInterfaces">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ospfInterface">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deadInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<ospf>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <ospfAreas>
    <ospfArea>
      <areaId></areaId>
      <type></type>
      <authentication>
        <type></type>
        <value></value>
      </authentication>
    </ospfArea>
  </ospfAreas>
  <ospfInterfaces>
    <ospfInterface>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <areaId></areaId>
      <helloInterval></helloInterval>
      <deadInterval></deadInterval>
      <priority></priority>
      <cost></cost>
    </ospfInterface>
  </ospfInterfaces>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rules>
      <rule>
        <prefixName></prefixName>
        <from>
          <isis></isis>
          <ospf></ospf>
          <bgp></bgp>
          <static></static>
          <connected></connected>
        </from>
        <action></action>
      </rule>
    </rules>
  </redistribution>
</ospf>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

Description

Static and default routes for specified Edge

get

Description

Read static and default routes

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure static and default routes

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="staticRouting">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="route">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<staticRouting>
  <staticRoutes>
    <route>
      <description></description>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <network></network>
      <nextHop></nextHop>
      <mtu></mtu>
    </route>
  </staticRoutes>
  <defaultRoute>
    <description></description>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
    <mtu></mtu>
  </defaultRoute>
</staticRouting>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/auth/localusers/users

Description

All users of NSX Edge

put

Description

Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="users">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="user">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
              <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<users>
  <user>
    <userId></userId>
    <password></password>
    <firstName></firstName>
    <lastName></lastName>
    <description></description>
    <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
    <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
    <allowChangePassword>
      <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
    </allowChangePassword>
  </user>
</users>

enableService boolean required

Set to true to enable, false to disable

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Reconfigure the entire SSL VPN

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="logonLogoffScript">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="logonLogoffScript">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="scriptFileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

  <logonLogoffScript>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

Description

SSL VPN advanced configuration

get

Description

Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Apply advanced configuration

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="advancedConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableCompression"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forceVirtualKeyboard"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preventMultipleLogon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="randomizeVirtualkeys"/>
        <xs:element name="timeout">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forcedTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sessionIdleTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clientNotification"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enablePublicUrlAccess"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableLogging"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<advancedConfig>
  <enableCompression></enableCompression>
  <forceVirtualKeyboard></forceVirtualKeyboard>
  <preventMultipleLogon></preventMultipleLogon>
  <randomizeVirtualkeys></randomizeVirtualkeys>
  <timeout>
    <forcedTimeout></forcedTimeout>
    <sessionIdleTimeout></sessionIdleTimeout>
  </timeout>
  <clientNotification></clientNotification>
  <enablePublicUrlAccess></enablePublicUrlAccess>
  <enableLogging></enableLogging>
</advancedConfig>

    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
        <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

    <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>

      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
        <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

Description

Authentication settings

get

Description

Get information about authentication server

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="authenticationConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="passwordAuthentication">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="authenticationTimeout"/>
              <xs:element name="primaryAuthServers">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSsl"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchBase"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindDomainName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindPassword"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loginAttributeName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchFilter"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secret"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nasIp"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryCount"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element name="passwordPolicy">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minLength"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxLength"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minAlphabets"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minDigits"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minSpecialChar"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowUserIdWithinPassword"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordLifeTime"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="expiryNotification"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="accountLockoutPolicy">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryCount"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryDuration"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lockoutDuration"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourceIp"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="secondaryAuthServer">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSsl"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchBase"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindDomainName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindPassword"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loginAttributeName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchFilter"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="terminateSessionOnAuthFails"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<authenticationConfig>
  <passwordAuthentication>
  <authenticationTimeout></authenticationTimeout>
    <primaryAuthServers>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <enableSsl></enableSsl>
        <searchBase></searchBase>
        <bindDomainName></bindDomainName>
        <bindPassword></bindPassword>
        <loginAttributeName></loginAttributeName>
        <searchFilter></searchFilter>
        <enabled></enabled>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <secret></secret>
        <nasIp></nasIp>
        <retryCount></retryCount>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <passwordPolicy>
          <minLength></minLength>
          <maxLength></maxLength>
          <minAlphabets></minAlphabets>
          <minDigits></minDigits>
          <minSpecialChar></minSpecialChar>
          <allowUserIdWithinPassword></allowUserIdWithinPassword>
          <passwordLifeTime></passwordLifeTime>
          <expiryNotification></expiryNotification>
        </passwordPolicy>
        <accountLockoutPolicy>
          <retryCount></retryCount>
          <retryDuration></retryDuration>
          <lockoutDuration></lockoutDuration>
        </accountLockoutPolicy>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <sourceIp></sourceIp>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
    </primaryAuthServers>
    <secondaryAuthServer>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
        <ip>1.1.1.1</ip>
        <port>90</port>
        <timeOut>20</timeOut>
        <enableSsl>false</enableSsl>
        <searchBase>searchbasevalue</searchBase>
        <bindDomainName>binddnvalue</bindDomainName>
        <bindPassword>password</bindPassword>
        <loginAttributeName>cain</loginAttributeName>
        <searchFilter>found</searchFilter>
        <terminateSessionOnAuthFails>false</terminateSessionOnAuthFails>
        <enabled>true</enabled>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
    </secondaryAuthServer>
  </passwordAuthentication>
</authenticationConfig>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings/rsaconfigfile

Description

RSA authentication server, bound to the SSL gateway

post

Description

Upload RSA config file (See "Generate the Authentication Manager Configuration File" section of the RSA Authentication Manager Administrator's guide for instructions on how to configure and download the RSA config file from RSA Authentication Manager)

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

Description

Advanced parameters for full access client configurations--such as whether client should auto-reconnect in case of network failures or network unavailability, or whether the client should be uninstalled after logout

put

Description

Set parameters for full access client configurations

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="clientConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoReconnect"/>
        <xs:element name="fullTunnel">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="excludeLocalSubnets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayIp"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="upgradeNotification"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<clientConfiguration>
  <autoReconnect></autoReconnect>
  <fullTunnel>
    <excludeLocalSubnets></excludeLocalSubnets>
    <gatewayIp></gatewayIp>
  </fullTunnel>
  <upgradeNotification></upgradeNotification>
</clientConfiguration>

get

Description

Get client configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

Description

Installation packages for SSL VPN clients

post

Description

Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="clientInstallPackage">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="profileName"/>
        <xs:element name="gatewayList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="gateway">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="startClientOnLogon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideSystrayIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rememberPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeOperation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeInstallation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideNetworkAdaptor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createDesktopIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enforceServerSecurityCertValidation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createLinuxClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createMacClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<clientInstallPackage>
  <profileName></profileName>
  <gatewayList>
    <gateway>
      <hostName></hostName>
      <port></port>
    </gateway>
  </gatewayList>
  <startClientOnLogon></startClientOnLogon>
  <hideSystrayIcon></hideSystrayIcon>
  <rememberPassword></rememberPassword>
  <silentModeOperation></silentModeOperation>
  <silentModeInstallation></silentModeInstallation>
  <hideNetworkAdaptor></hideNetworkAdaptor>
  <createDesktopIcon></createDesktopIcon>
  <enforceServerSecurityCertValidation></enforceServerSecurityCertValidation>
  <createLinuxClient></createLinuxClient>
  <createMacClient></createMacClient>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</clientInstallPackage>

get

Description

Get information about all installation packages

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Update all installation packages with the given list. If the package is present, it is updated; otherwise a new installation package is created. Existing packages not included in the body are deleted.

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Delete all client installation packages

Security

  • basic

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rememberPassword"/>

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeInstallation"/>

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createLinuxClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createMacClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

  <gatewayList>

      <port></port>
    </gateway>
  </gatewayList>

IP pools to assign IP addresses to remote users

post

Description

Create an IP pool

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipAddressPool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="netmask"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dnsSuffix"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="winsServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

  <description></description>
  <ipRange></ipRange>
  <netmask></netmask>
  <gateway></gateway>
  <primaryDns></primaryDns>
  <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
  <dnsSuffix></dnsSuffix>
  <winsServer></winsServer>
  <enabled></enabled>
</ipAddressPool>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="netmask"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dnsSuffix"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="winsServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

  <ipRange></ipRange>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

Configure a private network to expose to remote users over SSL VPN tunnel

post

Description

Add a private network

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="privateNetwork">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
        <xs:element name="sendOverTunnel">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ports"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="optimize"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

  <description></description>
  <network></network>
  <sendOverTunnel>
    <ports></ports>
    <optimize></optimize>
  </sendOverTunnel>
  <enabled></enabled>
</privateNetwork>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/server

Description

Configure SSL VPN server on port 443 using the certificate named server-cert that is already uploaded on the NSX Edge appliance and the specified cipher

get

Description

Get server settings

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Apply server settings

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="serverSettings">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="serverAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="certificateId"/>
        <xs:element name="sslVersionList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="version"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<serverSettings>
  <serverAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </serverAddresses>
  <port></port>
  <certificateId></certificateId>
  <sslVersionList>
    <version></version>
  </sslVersionList>
</serverSettings>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources

Description

Web access server that a remote user can connect to via a web browser

post

Description

Add portal web resource

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="webResource">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element name="method">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="data"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<webResource>
  <name></name>
  <url></url>
  <method name="">
    <data></data>
  </method>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</webResource>

get

Description

Get all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

Security

  • basic

delete

Description

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/status

Description

Edge status

get

Description

Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

getlatest boolean

true = fetch the status live from NSX Edge, false = fetch the latest available status from database

detailed boolean

true = fetch detailed status per feature, false = aggregated summary of status per feature

preRulesStatus boolean

true = fetch detailed output for pre rules in addition to the regular output

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/syslog/config

Configure one or two remote syslog servers. Edge events and logs related to firewall events that flow from Edge appliances are sent to the syslog servers

  • basic

put

Description

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="syslog">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element name="serverAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

Description

Working with interfaces. Add up to ten internal/uplink interfaces to each Edge. Each Edge must have at least one internal interface

post

Description

Add an interface or sub interface

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

action string required

always set to "patch"

Request Example (application/xml)

<vnics>
  <vnic>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <secondaryAddresses>
          <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </secondaryAddresses>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <index></index>
    <portgroupId></portgroupId>
    <portgroupName></portgroupName>
    <macAddress>
      <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
      <value></value>
    </macAddress>
    <fenceParameter>
      <key></key>
      <value></value>
    </fenceParameter>
    <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
    <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
    <enableBridgeMode></enableBridgeMode>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <inShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </inShapingPolicy>
    <outShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </outShapingPolicy>
  </vnic>
</vnics>

get

Description

Retrieve all interfaces for Edge

Security

  • basic

/4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics/{index}

Description

Specified interface by index

URI Parameters

index string required

Specified interface

get

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Security

  • basic

Request Example (application/xml)

<vnics>
  <vnic>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <secondaryAddresses>
          <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </secondaryAddresses>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <index></index>
    <portgroupId></portgroupId>
    <portgroupName></portgroupName>
    <macAddress>
      <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
      <value></value>
    </macAddress>
    <fenceParameter>
      <key></key>
      <value></value>
    </fenceParameter>
    <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
    <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
    <enableBridgeMode></enableBridgeMode>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <inShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </inShapingPolicy>
    <outShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </outShapingPolicy>
  </vnic>
</vnics>

/4.0/firewall

Distributed Firewall Operations

/4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration

Description

Tuning firewall performance

get

Description

Query RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Set RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags in body to improve performance

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="globalConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="layer3RuleOptimize"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="layer2RuleOptimize"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpStrictOption"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<globalConfiguration>
  <layer3RuleOptimize></layer3RuleOptimize>
  <layer2RuleOptimize></layer2RuleOptimize>
  <tcpStrictOption></tcpStrictOption>
</globalConfiguration>

/4.0/firewall/forceSync/{ID}

Description

Synchronize hosts and clusters with the last good configuration in NSX Mgr database

URI Parameters

ID string required

Specified host or cluster to synchronize

post

Description

Force sync host/cluster

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

Description

Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration

get

Description

Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration, use query Parameters to filter

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

ruleType string

ruleType can be LAYER3, LAYER2, L3REDIRECT. Rule Type is mandatory if other search parameters are sent

source string

source/destination can contain IPv4/v6 address or vm‐id

ruleId string

filter by ruleId

comment string

Comment can contain any portion of the comment entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

name string

Name can contain any portion of the rulename entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

siProfile string

siProfile can contain any portion of the ServiceProfile name associated with L3redirectrule. Search is case insensitive.

edgeId string

edgeId is the EdgeID, that displays rules applicable to the specified Edge

action string

Filter for specific action (allow, deny)

put

Description

This will update the complete firewall configuration in all sections. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET (dfwConfigShow) first. Then pass the modified version of the whole firewall configuration in the GET body

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

if-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewallConfiguration timestamp="">
  <contextId></contextId>
  <layer3Sections>
    <section id="defaultSectionLayer3" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
      <rule disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <sources excluded="false">
          <source>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
          </source>
        </sources>
        <services>
          <service>
            <destinationPort></destinationPort>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <subProtocol></subProtocol>
            </service>
        </services>
        <appliedToList>
          <appliedTo>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
          </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
      </rule>
    </section>
  </layer3Sections>
  <layer2Sections>
    <section id="1" name="defaultSectionLayer2" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
      <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <sectionId></sectionId>
      </rule>
    </section>
  </layer2Sections>
</firewallConfiguration>

delete

Description

Restores default configuration, which means one defaultLayer3 section with default allow rule and one defaultLayer2Section with default allow rule

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections

Description

L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

get

Description

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

name string

Name of the Section to read

post

Description

Creates a new L2 Firewall Section with a number of rules

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="sources" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="destinations" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="services" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="service">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationPort"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subProtocol"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled" use="optional"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged" use="optional"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="managedBy"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="type"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<section name="" managedBy="" type="">
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
      <destination>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

Description

L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

URI Parameters

sectionId string required

The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

get

Description

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>

delete

Description

Deletes a L2 section and its content by ID

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules

Description

Operations to add one or more L2 Rules

post

Description

Add L2 Rule

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="notes"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="sources">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="source">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destinations">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="destination">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="services">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="service">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Description

Operations on L2 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

URI Parameters

ruleId string required

The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

get

Description

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Updates a L2 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </service>
  </services>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
</rule>

delete

Description

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>

        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirect/profiles
