/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections

Description

Layer3 redirect sections and rules

post

Description

Add L3 redirect section

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<section>
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

Description

Layer3 redirect section

URI Parameters

section string required

Specify section by ID or name

get

Description

Get L3 redirect section configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

if-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
  </rule>
</section>

delete

Description

Delete specified L3 redirect section

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules

Description

L3 redirect rules for specified section

post

Description

Add L3 redirect rule

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

Description

Rule for specified section

URI Parameters

ruleID string required

Specified redirect rule

get

Description

Get L3 redirect rule

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

if-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
</rule>

delete

Description

Delete specified L3 redirect rule

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections

Description

L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

get

Description

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

name string

Name of the Section to read

post

Description

Creates a new L3 Firewall Section with a number of rules

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="sources" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="destinations" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="services" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="service">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationPort"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subProtocol"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled" use="optional"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged" use="optional"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="managedBy"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="type"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<section name="" managedBy="" type="">
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
      <destination>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
  </rule>
</section>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

Description

L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

URI Parameters

sectionId string required

The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

get

Description

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>

delete

Description

Deletes a L3 section and its content by ID

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules

Description

Operations to add one or more L3 Rules

post

Description

Add a L3 Rule

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="notes"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="sources">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="source">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destinations">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="destination">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="services">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="service">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Description

Operations on L3 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

URI Parameters

ruleId string required

The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

get

Description

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Updates a L3 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>

delete

Description

Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionName}

Description

L3 Firewall Update Operations on specific section specified by section Name

URI Parameters

sectionName string required

put

Description

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Security

  • basic

Request Headers

If-match string required

Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Request Example (application/xml)

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

Description

Import and export firewall configurations

post

Description

Save a firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewallDraft name="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <mode></mode>
  <config>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" >
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>

get

Description

Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

Description

Specified saved firewall configuration

URI Parameters

draftID string required

Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

get

Description

Get a saved firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Update a saved firewall configuration

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewallDraft name="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <mode></mode>
  <config>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" >
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>

delete

Description

Delete a configuration

Security

  • basic

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/export

Query Parameters

getLatestForUniversal boolean

Set to "true" to export the lasted universal draft from a secondary NSX manager.

/4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/import

Description

Import a configuration

post

Description

Import a configuration

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="user"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<firewallDraft id="" name="" timestamp="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <user></user>
  <mode></mode>
  <config timestamp="">
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" timestamp="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="" timestamp="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
    <generationNumber></generationNumber>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>

/4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

Description

Memory and CPU thresholds for firewall

get

Description

Retrieve memory, CPU, and CPS thresholds for firewall

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure thresholds

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="eventThresholds">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="cpu">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="percentValue"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="memory">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="percentValue"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="connectionsPerSecond">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<eventThresholds>
  <cpu>
    <percentValue></percentValue>
  </cpu>
  <memory>
    <percentValue></percentValue>
  </memory>
  <connectionsPerSecond>
    <value></value>
  </connectionsPerSecond>
</eventThresholds>

/4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

Description

Export specific flows directly from firewall to a flow collector

URI Parameters

contextId string required

Specified context

get

Description

Query IPFix configuration

Security

  • basic

put

Description

Configure IPFix

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipfixConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipfixEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="observationDomainId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="flowTimeout"/>
        <xs:element name="collector">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<ipfixConfiguration>
  <contextId></contextId>
  <ipfixEnabled></ipfixEnabled>
  <observationDomainId></observationDomainId>
  <flowTimeout></flowTimeout>
  <collector>
    <ip></ip>
    <port></port>
  </collector>
</ipfixConfiguration>

/4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

Description

SpoofGuard policies

post

Description

Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="operationMode"/>
        <xs:element name="enforcementPoint">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowLocalIPs"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<spoofguardPolicy>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <operationMode></operationMode>
  <enforcementPoint>
    <id></id>
    <name></name>
    <type></type>
  </enforcementPoint>
  <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

get

Description

Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

Security

  • basic

/4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

Description

Specified policy

URI Parameters

policyID string required

post

Description

Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

action string required

Set to "approve" along with specified IP addresses in body to approve them, or set to "publish" to publish the approved IP addresses

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardList">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="spoofguard">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicUuid"/>
              <xs:element name="approvedIpAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedMacAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedBy"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedOn"/>
              <xs:element name="publishedIpAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedMacAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedBy"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedOn"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<spoofguardList>
  <spoofguard>
    <id></id>
    <vnicUuid></vnicUuid>
    <approvedIpAddress>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </approvedIpAddress>
    <approvedMacAddress></approvedMacAddress>
    <approvedBy></approvedBy>
    <approvedOn></approvedOn>
    <publishedIpAddress>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </publishedIpAddress>
    <publishedMacAddress></publishedMacAddress>
    <publishedBy></publishedBy>
    <publishedOn></publishedOn>
  </spoofguard>
</spoofguardList>

get

Description

Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

Security

  • basic

Query Parameters

list string

Use to retrieve IP addresses for specified state (ACTIVE|INACTIVE|PUBLISHED|UNPUBLISHED|REVIEW_PENDING|DUPLICATE)

put

Description

Modify SpoofGuard policy

Security

  • basic

Request Schema

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="policyId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="operationMode"/>
        <xs:element name="enforcementPoint">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowLocalIPs"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Request Example (application/xml)

<spoofguardPolicy>
  <policyId></policyId>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <operationMode></operationMode>
  <enforcementPoint>
    <id></id>
    <name></name>
    <type></type>
  </enforcementPoint>
  <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

delete

Description

Delete a policy

Security

  • basic
